question: Will 'Insidious: The Red Door' gross more than $26.5m on its 3-day opening weekend?
description:
This is a market on how much 'Insidious: The Red Door' (2023) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/release/rl1137607425/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (July 07 - July 09) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if ‘Insidious: The Red Door'' (2023) grosses more than $26,500,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Opening weekend is defined as the first Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the film's release. Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo number under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend, regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by July 17, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

question: Will Macron remain President of France through July 10?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Emmanuel Macron remains the President of France without interruption from July 3, 2023 through July 10, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET (inclusive). Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be the CIA World Factbook page for France, currently available at https://www.cia.gov/the-world-factbook/countries/france/#government. A consensus of credible reporting will also suffice.

question: Who will crowdfund more money: Policeman or Nahel?
description:
Memorialization: at the time of this market's resolution, the money raised by each fundraiser was as follows:

Police: €1,635,800.00
Nahel: €465,969.11

------------------------

This market will resolve to the name of the individual who has more money donated to them in the listed fundraisers on Friday, July 7, 2023, 12:00:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Police" if the fundraiser for the family of the police officer known as Florian M. (https://www.gofundme.com/f/z86fy-soutien-pour-la-famille-du-policier-de-nanterre) has more money donated to it than the fundraiser for the family of Nahel Merzouk on this market's end time.

This market will resolve to "Nahel" if the fundraiser for the family of the shot teenager "Nahel Merzouk" (https://www.leetchi.com/fr/c/soutien-a-la-maman-de-nael-decede-ce-jour-a-nanterre-1608932) has more money donated to it than the fundraiser for the family of Florian M. on this market's end time.

This market will resolve 50-50 if the amount of money to the fundraisers is equal on this market's end time.

If one fundraiser is taken down before this market's resolution time but the other remains online, this market will resolve to the fundraiser that remains online.

If both fundraisers are offline at this market's resolution time, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The amount each fundraiser has raised on the resolution time will be memorialized on the Polymarket market description after the resolution time passes.

question: Will unverified Twitter users be able to see more than 1k posts per day by July 10?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if unverified Twitter profiles are permitted to view over 1000 posts per day by July 10, 2023, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If "new" unverified accounts are unable to view more than 1000 posts per day, but other unverified Twitter accounts are able to, this market will resolve to "Yes".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Twitter, including information provided by Elon Musk, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Tadej Pogačar win the 2023 Tour de France?
description:
The 2023 Tour de France is the 110th edition of the Tour de France. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Tadej Pogačar wins the 2023 Tour de France general classification and to "No" otherwise.

If for any reason the winner is not declared by July 31, 2023 (11 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No". Please note that any revisions to the results, after the champion receives the trophy, will have no bearing on this market.
